content: Whoo-oo, new Luca! The soft, pinkish sand of <color=#8AAB4B>Cherry Blossom Beaches</color> looks so tasty. I want to draw on it... with my tail~
Whoo-oo, new Luca! Shhh, quiet now... Don't disturb the peaceful <color=#8AAB4B>Mountainlush Meadows</color>. Guess I can't sweep the grass with my big tail now~
Whoo-oo, new Luca! The tiny sparkles on the <color=#8AAB4B>Luminous Beaches</color>... I feel like something's poking at my paws...
Whoo-oo, new Luca! <color=#8AAB4B>Crimsoncloud Cliffs</color>, where colorful clouds paint the cliffs. Let me... put on my sunglasses before taking another look~!
Whoo-oo, new Luca! The peaceful, twinkling waves come from the <color=#8AAB4B>Shimmering Seas</color>. I wonder, if I step on them, would butterflies fly out?
Whoo-oo, new Luca! It's the fluffy, blue <color=#8AAB4B>Myriad Meadows</color>... Oumuamua, can I brush my tail against it?
Whoo-oo, new Luca! <color=#8AAB4B>Bamboo Brooks</color>, where emerald bamboo leaves drift on the river. Whoo-oo... I want to float too!
